code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import api from'@services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UserProfile=()=>{const[user,setUser]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchUser=async()=>{try{const response=await api.get('/user/');setUser(response.data);}catch(err){const error=err;setError(error.detail||'Failed to fetch user data');}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchUser();},[]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Error: ",error]});if(!user)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"No user data"});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"User Profile"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Username: ",user.username]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Email: ",user.email]})]});};export default UserProfile;
